item.title: By: Hardeywarlex

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/comgold-review/#comment-1611">Shetemi</a>.
Comgold have suspended the PayPal withdrawal for vip0 user again

item.title: By: Shetemi
item.dc:creator: Shetemi
item.description: I try to bind PayPal account to comgold but the option to change it to bankcard is not available, only the usdt option is available
item.content:encoded: I try to bind PayPal account to comgold but the option to change it to bankcard is not available, only the usdt option is available
